thread.section_title: Hotel on Rivington - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Worst sleep of my life
thread.title_full: Worst sleep of my life - Review of Hotel on Rivington, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Morissa W
title: Worst sleep of my life
text:
I had high hopes for Hotel on Rivington, but was extremely disappointed with our stay. The room was gorgeous and large for Manhattan standards. However, we were on the 4th floor, corner room facing Rivington St. It was SO loud!! Neither my husband or I could get to sleep until 4am. Look, I get NYC is loud--I lived in Manhattan for over 8 years--but this was ridiculous. Sadly, it was a terrible experience for us.
Room Tip: Request a rear-facing or high floor room See more room tips
